rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel prep.status, add code "if ($L.active and $L.inactive) then ($L.all=true)"
remove legacy defer status
Searching for "In Progress" Change Tasks provides too much records
Back review a change record get a error tip
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
Added a couple panels before reformat.query to keep count of the number of quotes so that "and" won't be parsed out if it is part of a string.
Star Team: Now checks $L.approval.groups, the list of approval groups returned from approval.select.groups. If empty, the $NO.QUERY exit is taken.
Added structure names to conditions on check.change.query.a.
Removed the following line from the append panel so that users are no longer restricted to searching for changes listed under the Allowed Categories array.
if (lng($L.allowed.cats)>0) then $L.query+=(" and category isin "+str($L.allowed.cats))
Removed "header" tags.
Put quotes around str(header,number in $RECORD) in $FINAL.QUERY since it is now a character type field.
Same fix as below. On the check.save.query panel this time.
Added code to make prevent adding a blank (zero length string) append query to the query.
Added $L.view.query=$FINAL.QUERY to view the query on init.vars after the genquery was run. Used for debuging a query issue.
Modified panels close.groups and add.review.operator so that the query is appended with an "" element for either approvals or reviewers.
In panel prep.review.query, to only insert the operator name if it doesn't exist in the variable $select.groups.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
Added code so that we can tell if we are in changes or tasks when we come from the sc.manage application...
Modified so that a query defaults to "all" changes instead of opening up the window so select a status.
Modified so that when no record is passed the query defaults to the query passed. This will allow proper use from the sc.manage application.
Changed all $cm3 variables (with the exception of the $cm3.query.status, which is set by the display options) to reference the $G.cm3x.environment variables.
Changed approval/review selection criteria to use t/f check boxes instead of the letter "s".
cm3.query.build panels: build.task.middle; build.middle
set middle="true" rather than "" if null($FLAG)
removed references to header,last
added allowed categories
fix comments
removed global $cm3.review
removed reference to option()
put in display. took out window calls.

descript.descript: update panel prep.status, add code "if ($L.active and $L.inactive) then ($L.all=true)"
remove legacy defer status
Searching for "In Progress" Change Tasks provides too much records
Back review a change record get a error tip

Added a couple panels before reformat.query to keep count of the number of quotes so that "and" won't be parsed out if it is part of a string.
Star Team: Now checks $L.approval.groups, the list of approval groups returned from approval.select.groups. If empty, the $NO.QUERY exit is taken.

Removed the following line from the append panel so that users are no longer restricted to searching for changes listed under the Allowed Categories array.
if (lng($L.allowed.cats)>0) then $L.query+=(" and category isin "+str($L.allowed.cats))
Removed "header" tags.

Modified panels close.groups and add.review.operator so that the query is appended with an "" element for either approvals or reviewers.
In panel prep.review.query, to only insert the operator name if it doesn't exist in the variable $select.groups.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
Added code so that we can tell if we are in changes or tasks when we come from the sc.manage application...
Modified so that a query defaults to "all" changes instead of opening up the window so select a status.
Modified so that when no record is passed the query defaults to the query passed. This will allow proper use from the sc.manage application.
Changed all $cm3 variables (with the exception of the $cm3.query.status, which is set by the display options) to reference the $G.cm3x.environment variables.
Changed approval/review selection criteria to use t/f check boxes instead of the letter "s".
cm3.query.build panels: build.task.middle; build.middle
set middle="true" rather than "" if null($FLAG)
removed references to header,last
added allowed categories
fix comments
removed global $cm3.review
removed reference to option()
put in display. took out window calls.
